name: Flying Car Racing Simulator
description:
Ready to drive the one of a kind hi-tech flying racing cars? Drive fast down city streets or fly high in the sky above the city like an airplane? Experience now the latest in driving and flying simulations with one of the best ultimate flying car games!

!!!DOWNLOAD ULTIMATE FLYING CAR SIMULATOR FOR FREE!!!

Activate fly mode in the ultimate flying car and be amazed as wings transform from the body of the racing car. Step on the gas pedal and turn on the nitro boost to get a fast takeoff into the skies. Fly through narrow gaps between skyscrapers, disrupt busy sky traffic, and show off your awesome high flying skills in the one of a kind flying car simulator games.

- Drive and fly cars to extreme speeds with nitro boosters
- Explore amazingly detailed city environment, drive through streets or fly between tall skyscrapers
- Become the world's best pilot of the flying car prototype

Perform amazing stunts, drift around city streets, go offroad or take off to the skies in airplane flight mode. With the flick of a switch, witness the car transform from a fast racing car into a unique flying car equipped with jet engines! Go from street racer to pilot in one of the best flying car games available!

GAME FEATURES:
- Test your driving and flight skills with realistic control physics
- Next-gen HD game graphics
- Fly around the city with other AI flying traffic
- Real life sports car modified for flight capability
- Massive open world city world environment
- Realistic car driving and flying controls
- Dynamic HD camera angles
- Simulated airplane flight physics
- Free to play!!

Ultimate Flying Car Simulator is made for all flight and driving simulation gamers, enjoy everything about both simulators all in one awesome package. Available to download one of the best flying car simulator games now for free!
